SetFrames.short_help: Specifies the set of frames to render
SetFrames.description:
Arguments:
    frames - a list in the form '1..10,15,20'

RetryRenderNode.short_help: Attempts to reuse slaves that have previously failed
RetryRenderNode.description:
Arguments:
    node - the RenderNode object to retry
If 'node' is not specified, all failed RenderNodes are retried

ClearCompletedFrames.short_help: Clears the list of completed frames, restarting the render

GetUnrenderedFrames.short_help: Returns the remaining frames to be rendered
GetUnrenderedFrames.description: Returns a string of frame numbers in the form '1..10,15,20'

GetFrames.short_help: Returns the total set of frames to be rendered
GetFrames.description: Returns a string of frame numbers in the form '1..10,15,20'

GetFailedSlaves.short_help: Lists all slaves that failed this job

GetSlaveList.short_help: Gets a table of slaves assigned to this job

IsRendering.short_help: Returns true if job is currently rendering
